Plot: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair and his children are up to no good.
Title: Keeping Mum
Writer: Richard Russo (screenplay), Niall Johnson (screenplay), Richard Russo (story)
Actors: Rowan Atkinson, Kristin Scott Thomas, Maggie Smith, Patrick Swayze
tomatoConsensus: The stellar cast, including Kristin Scott Thomas and Dame Maggie Smith, is certainly an asset, but this black comedy is too uneven.
